defaults.description:
Actions can perform tasks, automate processes, and enhance user interactions. It can also trigger other action-type cards on the board.

  #### Key Features
  - Run actions from rules.
  - Chain/trigger other action cards.
  - Parameterized execution.
  - Customize parameters.
  - Customize the card view (UI/render).
